```lean4
theorem putnam_1972_b6
(k : ℕ)
(hk : k ≥ 1)
(n : Fin k → ℤ)
(hn : ∀ i : Fin k, n i > 0)
(hn' : ∀ i j : Fin k, i < j → n i < n j)
(zpoly : ℂ → ℂ)
(hzpoly : zpoly = fun z => 1 + ∑ i : Fin k, z^(n i))
: ∀ z : ℂ, z ∈ ball 0 ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1)/2) → zpoly z ≠ 0 := by
  intro z hz
  rw [hzpoly]
  have h₁ : z ∈ ball (0 : ℂ) ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1) / 2) := hz
  have h₂ : 0 < Real.sqrt 5 := by norm_num [Real.sqrt_pos]
  have h₃ : (Real.sqrt 5 - 1) / 2 < 1 := by
    nlinarith [Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
  have h₄ : ∀ i : Fin k, n i > 0 := hn
  have h₅ : ∀ i j : Fin k, i < j → n i < n j := hn'
  have h₆ : 1 + ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) ≠ 0 := by
    intro h
    have h₇ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) = -1 := by linear_combination h
    have h₈ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) = -1 := by linear_combination h₇
    have h₉ : z ∈ ball (0 : ℂ) ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1) / 2) := h₁
    have h₁₀ : z ∈ ball (0 : ℂ) ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1) / 2) := h₉
    have h₁₁ : ‖z‖ < ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1) / 2) := by simpa using h₁₀
    have h₁₂ : ‖z‖ < 1 := by nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
    have h₁₃ : ‖z‖ ≥ 0 := norm_nonneg z
    have h₁₄ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) = -1 := by linear_combination h₈
    have h₁₅ : ‖∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i)‖ ≤ ∑ i : Fin k, ‖z ^ (n i)‖ := by
      apply norm_sum_le
    have h₁₆ : ∑ i : Fin k, ‖z ^ (n i)‖ = ∑ i : Fin k, ‖z‖ ^ (n i) := by
      simp [norm_pow]
    have h₁₇ : ∑ i : Fin k, ‖z‖ ^ (n i) ≥ ∑ i : Fin k, ‖z‖ ^ 1 := by
      apply Finset.sum_le_sum
      intro i _
      exact pow_le_pow_right (by
        have h₁₈ : ‖z‖ ≥ 0 := norm_nonneg z
        have h₁₉ : ‖z‖ < 1 := by nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
        nlinarith) (by
          have h₂₀ : n i ≥ 1 := by
            have h₂₁ : n i > 0 := hn i
            linarith
          nlinarith [h₂₀])
    have h₁₈ : ∑ i : Fin k, ‖z‖ ^ 1 = k * ‖z‖ := by
      simp [Finset.sum_const, Finset.card_fin]
    have h₁₉ : ‖z‖ < 1 := by nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
    nlinarith [norm_nonneg z, Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
  exact h₆
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1972_b6
(k : ℕ)
(hk : k ≥ 1)
(n : Fin k → ℤ)
(hn : ∀ i : Fin k, n i > 0)
(hn' : ∀ i j : Fin k, i < j → n i < n j)
(zpoly : ℂ → ℂ)
(hzpoly : zpoly = fun z => 1 + ∑ i : Fin k, z^(n i))
: ∀ z : ℂ, z ∈ ball 0 ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1)/2) → zpoly z ≠ 0 := by
  intro z hz
  rw [hzpoly]
  have h₁ : zpoly z = 1 + ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) := rfl
  have h₂ : z ∈ ball 0 ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1) / 2) := hz
  have h₃ : ∀ i : Fin k, n i > 0 := hn
  have h₄ : ∀ i j : Fin k, i < j → n i < n j := hn'
  have h₅ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) ≠ -1 := by
    intro h
    have h₆ : z = 0 := by
      have h₇ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) = -1 := h
      have h₈ : z = 0 := by
        by_contra h₉
        have h₁₀ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) ≠ -1 := by
          -- Use the fact that the sum of non-zero complex numbers raised to positive integer powers cannot be -1
          have h₁₁ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) = -1 := h₇
          have h₁₂ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) ≠ -1 := by
            simp_all [Complex.ext_iff, pow_one, Finset.sum_eq_zero]
            <;>
            nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
          exact h₁₂
        simp_all
      simp_all
    simp_all [Complex.ext_iff, pow_one, Finset.sum_eq_zero]
    <;>
    nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
  simp_all [Complex.ext_iff, pow_one, Finset.sum_eq_zero]
  <;>
  nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1972_b6
(k : ℕ)
(hk : k ≥ 1)
(n : Fin k → ℤ)
(hn : ∀ i : Fin k, n i > 0)
(hn' : ∀ i j : Fin k, i < j → n i < n j)
(zpoly : ℂ → ℂ)
(hzpoly : zpoly = fun z => 1 + ∑ i : Fin k, z^(n i))
: ∀ z : ℂ, z ∈ ball 0 ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1)/2) → zpoly z ≠ 0 := by
  intro z hz
  rw [hzpoly]
  have h₁ : 1 + ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) ≠ 0 := by
    intro h
    have h₂ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) = -1 := by linear_combination h
    have h₃ : z = 0 := by
      by_contra hz'
      have h₄ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) = -1 := by linear_combination h₂
      have h₅ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) ≠ -1 := by
        -- Use the fact that the sum of complex numbers with magnitude less than 1 cannot be -1
        have h₆ : ∀ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) ≠ -1 := by
          intro i
          have h₇ : z ^ (n i) ≠ -1 := by
            have h₈ : z ∈ ball 0 ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1)/2) := hz
            have h₉ : ‖z‖ < ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1)/2) := by simpa using hz
            have h₁₀ : ‖z ^ (n i)‖ = ‖z‖ ^ (n i) := by simp [norm_zpow]
            have h₁₁ : ‖z‖ ^ (n i) < ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1)/2) ^ (n i) := by
              exact pow_lt_pow_of_lt_left h₉ (by positivity) (by
                have h₁₂ : n i > 0 := hn i
                linarith)
            have h₁₂ : ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1)/2) ^ (n i) < 1 := by
              have h₁₃ : (Real.sqrt 5 - 1)/2 < 1 := by
                nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
              exact pow_lt_one (by nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]) h₁₃ (by
                have h₁₄ : n i ≥ 1 := by
                  have h₁₅ : n i > 0 := hn i
                  linarith
                linarith)
            nlinarith
          exact h₇
        simp_all [Finset.sum_eq_zero]
      simp_all
    simp_all
  exact h₁
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1972_b6
(k : ℕ)
(hk : k ≥ 1)
(n : Fin k → ℤ)
(hn : ∀ i : Fin k, n i > 0)
(hn' : ∀ i j : Fin k, i < j → n i < n j)
(zpoly : ℂ → ℂ)
(hzpoly : zpoly = fun z => 1 + ∑ i : Fin k, z^(n i))
: ∀ z : ℂ, z ∈ ball 0 ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1)/2) → zpoly z ≠ 0 := by
  intro z hz
  rw [hzpoly]
  have h₁ : 1 + ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) ≠ 0 := by
    intro h
    have h₂ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) = -1 := by linear_combination h
    have h₃ : z = 0 := by
      -- Use the fact that the sum of complex numbers with magnitude less than 1 cannot be -1
      by_contra hz'
      have h₄ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) ≠ -1 := by
        -- Use the fact that the sum of complex numbers with magnitude less than 1 cannot be -1
        have h₅ : ∀ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) = z ^ (n i) := by simp
        have h₆ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) = ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) := by simp
        simp_all [Finset.sum_eq_zero]
        <;>
        simp_all [Complex.abs, Complex.normSq, Complex.ext_iff, pow_two, Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq,
          Real.sqrt_nonneg, Real.sq_sqrt, le_of_lt, Real.sqrt_pos]
        <;>
        nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
      contradiction
    simp_all
  exact h₁
```

```lean4
          intro i
          exact pow_ne_zero _ (by aesop)
        have h₇ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) ≠ -1 := by
          simp_all [Finset.sum_eq_zero]
          <;> aesop
        exact h₇
      aesop
    simp_all
  exact h₁
```

(zpoly : ℂ → ℂ)

```lean4
theorem putnam_1972_b6
(k : ℕ)
(hk : k ≥ 1)
(n : Fin k → ℤ)
(hn : ∀ i : Fin k, n i > 0)
(hn' : ∀ i j : Fin k, i < j → n i < n j)
(zpoly : ℂ → ℂ)
(hzpoly : zpoly = fun z => 1 + ∑ i : Fin k, z^(n i))
: ∀ z : ℂ, z ∈ ball 0 ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1)/2) → zpoly z ≠ 0 := by
  intro z hz
  rw [hzpoly]
  have h₁ : 1 + ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) ≠ 0 := by
    have h₂ : ∀ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) = z ^ (n i) := by simp
    have h₃ : 1 + ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) ≠ 0 := by
      norm_num at hz
      have h₄ : 0 < (Real.sqrt 5 - 1) / 2 := by
        nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
      have h₅ : |z| < (Real.sqrt 5 - 1) / 2 := by simpa using hz
      have h₆ : ∀ i : Fin k, |z ^ (n i)| = |z| ^ (n i) := by
        intro i
        simp [Complex.abs_pow]
      have h₇ : ∑ i : Fin k, |z ^ (n i)| < 1 := by
        have h₈ : ∑ i : Fin k, |z ^ (n i)| = ∑ i : Fin k, |z| ^ (n i) := by
          apply Finset.sum_congr rfl
          intro i _
          rw [h₆ i]
        rw [h₈]
        have h₉ : ∑ i : Fin k, |z| ^ (n i) < 1 := by
          have h₁₀ : ∑ i : Fin k, |z| ^ (n i) < 1 := by
            have h₁₁ : |z| < (Real.sqrt 5 - 1) / 2 := by simpa using h₅
            have h₁₂ : ∀ i : Fin k, |z| ^ (n i) ≤ |z| ^ 1 := by
              intro i
              have h₁₃ : n i ≥ 1 := by
                have h₁₄ : 0 < n i := hn i
                linarith
              exact pow_le_pow_of_le_one (Complex.abs.nonneg z) (by linarith [h₁₁]) (by linarith [hn' i (Fin.last k)])
            calc
              ∑ i : Fin k, |z| ^ (n i) ≤ ∑ i : Fin k, |z| ^ 1 := Finset.sum_le_sum fun i _ => h₁₂ i
              _ = k * |z| ^ 1 := by simp [Finset.sum_const]
              _ = k * |z| := by simp
              _ < 1 := by
                have h₁₃ : (k : ℝ) ≥ 1 := by exact_mod_cast hk
                have h₁₄ : |z| < (Real.sqrt 5 - 1) / 2 := by simpa using h₅
                nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
          exact h₁₀
        exact h₉
      have h₈ : 1 + ∑ i : Fin k, |z ^ (n i)| ≠ 0 := by
        have h₉ : ∑ i : Fin k, |z ^ (n i)| < 1 := by exact h₇
        nlinarith [abs_nonneg (1 + ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i))]
      simpa [Complex.abs.nonneg] using h₈
    exact h₃
  exact h₁
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1972_b6
(k : ℕ)
(hk : k ≥ 1)
(n : Fin k → ℤ)
(hn : ∀ i : Fin k, n i > 0)
(hn' : ∀ i j : Fin k, i < j → n i < n j)
(zpoly : ℂ → ℂ)
(hzpoly : zpoly = fun z => 1 + ∑ i : Fin k, z^(n i))
: ∀ z : ℂ, z ∈ ball 0 ((Real.sqrt 5 - 1)/2) → zpoly z ≠ 0 := by
  intro z hz
  rw [hzpoly]
  simp only [ne_eq, add_eq_zero_iff, one_ne_zero, Finset.sum_eq_zero, false_or]
  intro h
  have h₁ : z = 0 := by
    have h₂ : z = 0 := by
      have h₃ : ∑ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) = -1 := by simpa using h
      have h₄ : ∀ i : Fin k, z ^ (n i) = 0 := by
        intro i
        have h₅ : z ^ (n i) = 0 := by
          have h₆ : z ^ (n i) = 0 := by
            simp_all [Complex.ofReal_inj]
            <;>
            tauto
          exact h₆
        exact h₅
      have h₅ : z = 0 := by
        simp_all [Complex.ofReal_inj]
        <;>
        tauto
      exact h₅
    exact h₂
  simp_all [Complex.ofReal_inj]
  <;>
  tauto
```
